  • In 2022, Guinea-Bissau will pay an estimated US$40.4 million in debt service. That isabout 11.1 of the country's total budget.
  • As of 18 September, 19.6% of the populationof Guinea-Bissau are fully vaccinated against COVID-19

• On 31 August 2022, inflation in Seychelles was 2.82.
  • The IMF estimates a GDP growth of4.6% inin 2022.
  • 0.5 of the population of Seychelles lives in extreme poverty, according to the latestWorld Bank data (2018).
  • As of 18 September, 76.3% of the populationof Seychelles are fully vaccinated against COVID-19
